item.description:
Good news Everyone!

 

We had a poll for the July book and you guys chose American Gods by Neil Gaiman.

 

From the Amazon synopsis:

Released from prison, Shadow finds his world turned upside down. His wife has been killed; a mysterious stranger offers him a job. But Mr. Wednesday, who knows more about Shadow than is possible, warns that a storm is coming -- a battle for the very soul of America . . . and they are in its direct path.

 

We will be meeting at Comicazi on Highland Ave in Davis Square. There is metered parking all along Highland as well as a public lot on Day Street near Redbones. There is also T access and bus connections.

 

See you there!  
-Josh

EDIT: Oh my, 31 respondents! I had to cap the responses because Comicazi cannot handle much more people than this. I set up a waiting list for those that would like to respond late.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back of the store.
item.name: July Book Club Meeting
